EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Pivotal_Roadshow_Q216.Reminder - London
EmailTemplate.subject: See you tomorrow at the Pivotal Cloud Native Roadshow!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for signing up to attend the Cloud Native Roadshow taking place tomorrow in London. We look forward to seeing you there!
Pivotal Cloud Native Roadshow—London Wednesday, 6th July 2016 9:00am – 9:30am Breakfast 9:30am – 3:30pm Sessions Roadshow Agenda <[[http://pivotal.io/event/pivotal-cloud-native-roadshow/london]]>
Location: The Warehouse 211 Old Street, 2nd Floor London EC1V 9NR
Questions? Contact Marie-Jeanne Dougados at mdougados@pivotal.io <[[mailto:mdougados@pivotal.io]]>.
We look forward to seeing you tomorrow!
The Pivotal Team
